alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 12 at 8:01PM MDT until April 14 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sheridan County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. These conditions may cause severe to extreme stress to newborn livestock. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect periods of a rain and snow mix. Snow accumulation is more likely during the nighttime hours. Greater snowfall is expected at higher elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
